Magic Notes:
Intelligence Wizard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level W1, W2
School Specialization (Abjuration): Extra Abjuration spell/dy each spell level
School Specialization (Conjuration): Extra Conjuration spell/dy each spell level
School Specialization (Divination): Extra Divination spell/dy each spell level
School Specialization (Enchantment): Extra Enchantment spell/dy each spell level
School Specialization (Evocation): Extra Evocation spell/dy each spell level
School Specialization (Illusion): Extra Illusion spell/dy each spell level
School Specialization (Necromancy): Extra Necromancy spell/dy each spell level
School Specialization (Transmutation): Extra Transmutation spell/dy each spell level
Acid Dart Conjuration: R30' touch 1d6+10 HP 5/dy
Aura Of Despair: R30' Foes -2 ability, attack, damage, save, and skill for 20 rd/dy
Blinding Ray: R30' Ranged touch blinds or dazzles target for 1 rd 5/dy
Bonded Object: May cast known spell through object
Brew Potion: Create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Change Shape: Beast Shape III/Elemental Body II for 20 rd/dy
Craft Staff: Create magic staff
Craft Wondrous Item: Create and mend miscellaneous magic items
Dazing Touch Enchantment: Touch attack dazes 20 HD foe for 1 rd 5/dy
Dimensional Steps: Teleport up to 600'/dy
Diviner's Fortune: Touched creature +10 attack, skill, ability, and save for 1 rd 5/dy
Elemental Wall: Wall Of Fire/Acid/Cold/Electricity for 20 rd/dy
Extend Spell: x2 chosen spell duration uses +1 spell slot
Extended Illusions: Illusion duration increased unlimited rd
Force Missile: Magic Missile 1d4+10 HP 5/dy
Grave Touch Necromantic: Touch causes shaken for 10 rd 5/dy
Heighten Spell: Increase chosen spell level
Intense Spells: +10 Evocation spell damage, use best of two rolls to overcome resistance on Evocation spells
Invisibility Field: Self invisible for 20 rd/dy
Maximize Spell: Maximize all chosen spell variable effects uses +3 spell slot
Metamagic Mastery: Apply metamagic feat w/1 level reduction 7/dy
Protective Ward: R10' Allies +5 for 2 rd 5/dy
Quicken Spell: Free action casting 1/rd uses +4 spell slot
School Opposition (Abjuration): Double cost to cast Abjuration spells
School Opposition (Conjuration): Double cost to cast Conjuration spells
School Opposition (Divination): Double cost to cast Divination spells
School Opposition (Enchantment): Double cost to cast Enchantment spells
School Opposition (Evocation): Double cost to cast Evocation spells
School Opposition (Illusion): Double cost to cast Illusion spells
School Opposition (Necromancy): Double cost to cast Necromancy spells
School Opposition (Transmutation): Double cost to cast Transmutation spells
Scribe Scroll: Create scroll of any known spell
Scrying Adept: Constant Detect Scrying, +1 scrying subject familiarity
Summoner's Charm: Summon duration increased unlimited rd
Telekinetic Fist: R30' touch 1d4+10 HP 5/dy
Companions
Familiar: Monkey "Bantcasho"
Str: 3 (-4) Dex: 15 (+2) Con: 10 (+0) Int: 15 (+2) Wis: 12 (+1) Cha: 5 (-3) Size: T Speed: 30
HD/HP: 20/26 Init: +2 AC: 24 Attack: +14 1d3-4 CMB/CMD: +10/16 Fort/Ref/Will: +6/+8/+13
Familiar Features: Companion Alertness; Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Companion Spell Resistance; Deliver Touch Spells; Empathic Link; Scry On Familiar; Share Spells; Speak With Like Animals; Speak With Master
Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: Deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
